description: Quickly build Marlin for your MOTHERBOARD.
view.workbench.abm.inactive:
The workspace doesn't contain a (valid) Marlin 2.x project. To use this extension…
[Open a Marlin 2.x Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)
…in the workspace.
[❤ Support Marlin](https://github.com/sponsors/MarlinFirmware)
If you find Marlin useful, please consider supporting our ongoing work!
[Close](command:workbench.action.closeSidebar "Close the Welcome view")
view.workbench.abm.intro:
Marlin Firmware 2.x is open in the workspace!
[Show ABM Panel](command:abm.show)
…or use one of the buttons above to Build, Upload, Clean, etc.
[Edit Configuration.h](command:abm.edit.base "Basic machine settings")
[Edit Configuration_adv.h](command:abm.edit.adv "Additional machine settings")
…with the Configuration Editor.
[❤ Support Marlin](command:abm.sponsor)
If you find Marlin useful, please consider supporting our ongoing work!
[Close](command:workbench.action.closeSidebar "Close the Welcome view")
